nodes.text: Stand Strong was a propaganda poster created by Hobisan Vandron for the Galactic Empire. It depicts a crowd of at least five stormtroopers standing at attention against a rayed background with the Imperial crest barely visible, and above the troopers is a shadowed image of Emperor Sheev Palpatine with his hands outstretched with a slight halo behind him. At the bottom reads the text "Stand Strong" in large font, and in smaller font "Don't Fail the Emperor."
